name: Magicka
notes: A Steam window will be stuck when "Performing first time setup," when this happens, close the window; from the WINE System Tray, start up Magicka again. Eventually an error will be thrown and the game will start.
content:
game:
  appid: 42910
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    arch: win32
    description: Installing dotnet35
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: xna31
    arch: win32
    description: Installing xna31
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: xinput
    arch: win32
    description: Installing xinput
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2008 win7
    description: Installing vcrun2008
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
